net.canarymod.hook.system

Class ServerListPingHook

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.canarymod.hook.Hook
      • net.canarymod.hook.CancelableHook
        • net.canarymod.hook.system.ServerListPingHook

  • public class ServerListPingHook
extends CancelableHook
    Called when a client ping the server
    Author:
    greatman, Jason (darkdiplomat)
